cause.description:
Hello everyone!! My daughter is just recovering from this scary disease. Its lucky that I caught it early or some severe damage could've been done to her little heart. There is no known cause for this deadly disease. Please help me spread awareness so we can find out how to prevent this disease!! Check out this website to find out more--> http://www.kdfoundation.org/
1. Need to find out how to prevent this disease!!
cause.name: Kawasaki Disease
